events.name: Google Developer Days Europe 2017 Extended - MBARARA
events.description:
This is an event where we shall converge to mainly stream and be part of the Google Developer Days Europe which will take place in Kraków, featuring technical talks on Android, the Mobile Web, Firebase, Cloud, Machine Learning, and IoT.

We shall also run local talks or codelabs during this event which will span over a period of about 48hrs

events.name: GDG Mbarara Google Cloud Event
events.description: This is an event meant to bring together willing minds and hearts interested in learning how google cloud works. This is the first of its kind opportunity that will allow members to participate  in  all three Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.everyone that joins this meetup will get an official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
events.how_to_find_us: GDG Mbarara Google Cloud Event

events.name: CLOUD STUDY JAM
events.description:
• What we'll do
This is an event meant to bring together willing minds and hearts interested in learning how google cloud works. This is the first of its kind opportunity that will allow members to participate in all three Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.everyone that joins this meetup will get an official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.

• What to bring
Laptops, Pens, Notebooks

• Important to know

events.name: Hash Code 2018 by Google
events.description:
• What we'll do
We’ll be hosting a hub at Codinex Uganda for the Online Qualification Round of Hash Code, a team-based programming competition created by Google for university students and industry professionals. The Online Qualification Round takes place on 1st March at 8:30 PM EAT (18:30 CET) and registered teams from Western Uganda are invited to participate from our hub, which will take place on City Mall, Codinex Uganda. Top scoring teams from the Online Qualification Round will then be invited to Google’s Dublin office to compete in the Final Round of the competition in April.

• What to bring
Laptops, Books and Sweater

• Important to know
We expect to have participants with clear mind about programming.

events.name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended and ML Study Jam
events.description:
• What we'll do
New to machine learning but dont know where to start? Join us for a Machine Learning Study Jam where we will run through the Machine Learning Crash Course(MLCC)!
This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a pratical, applied perspective that will enable you to use machine learning in your everyday projects and learn about the power of TensorFlow. This is a great opportunity for anyone with basic technical knowledge and limited Machine Learning knowledge willing to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow

• What to bring
pens, laptops,notebooks

• Important to know

events.name: Google I/O Extended 2018 Mbarara
events.description:
Google I/O Extended 2018 Mbarara aims at bringing together developers for all western Uganda to experience the keynote and other I/O sessions which will specifically come after our Codelab Sessions that will run for half a day. Its a day full of experience sharing and learning new Google cloud technologies.
Have you heard about Flutter?. Would you like to learn more about developing apps with flutter technology?.
Would you like to develop your first flutter app?.
Book a spot. This event is going to be an amazing all in one packed event. We shall introduce to flutter technology and help you write your first flutter app.
events.how_to_find_us: Enter Mbarara City Mall and Enter thru the Codinex Office up to the Conference Hall

events.name: Flutter, Firebase and TensorFlow Sessions Every Friday for 8 weeks.
events.description:
GDG Mbarara has decided to run follow up events for the Google IO 18 that featured flutter as one of the most amazing frameworks to develop mobile applications.
In these recurring sessions, participants shall learn how to develop mobile apps using flutter, web apps using firebase and we shall do session on Tensorflow too for 8 weeks.
events.how_to_find_us: At the codinex conference center every friday from 4:00pm-7:00pm

events.name: GDG MBARARA Next '18
events.description:
Next '18 will be taking place on July 24-26, 2018 in San Francisco. We shall be streaming the event on 28th July.
We shall also do a codelab for machine learning

events.name: Flutter Study Jam Mbarara
events.description: During the flutter study jams, we are going to super charge our flutter skills and develop apps. Following the flutter basics sessions held in june and part of july. We shall develop apps that will be featured and further developed by the consistent groups that will be formed then. We look forward to having amazing apps coming out of our study jams. For new members who have not attended any of our events. We shall distribute you evenly with our continuing groups so that you can be able to follow along. But mainly we shall be doing flutter from basics so that everyone can be able to pick up and develop something.
events.how_to_find_us: We shall be at  Codinex Computers ltd  City Mall 2nd floor .

events.name: Devfest "18 Mbarara
events.description:
This devfest is one of a kind, We shall run two tracks of newbies and intermediate and experts developers. The event will be full of code sessions in Flutter, Fire-base, Machine Learning, tensor-flow and many more technologies.
Its a day to celebrate the new technologies and be able to learn from one another and collaborate and look at many ways we can create tailored solutions of our local communities.
We shall pack the two days packed with codelab sessions, speaker sessions and mini hackathons implementing apps with flutter, firebase, android of things, tensorflow, ML and other technologies.
events.how_to_find_us: Easy View Complex , Mbaguta Street - Mbarara Town

events.name: Flutter, Firebase and TensorFlow Sessions Every Friday for 8 weeks.

events.how_to_find_us: At the codinex conference center every friday from 4:00pm-7:00pm

events.name: Flutter Live
events.description: Join us for Flutter Live on December 4th to experience the latest from Flutter, Google’s free and open source SDK for building high-quality native iOS and Android apps from a single codebase. Presented from the Science Museum in London, we are optimizing Flutter Live to reach the largest audience of mobile developers and provide all the rigor and excitement of an in-person experience to our global online audience.
events.how_to_find_us: Come to Codinex Computers, Located on  City-Mall or former Nakumatt, Room 33.

events.name: Flutter Study Jam Reloaded
events.description:
What Will the days be made of?.
We shall run 3 day flutter study Jam that will include finest flutter classes, lots of eating and drinking, Mentor-ship, Deep understanding of Mobile App development, Small App-hack-thon and Final app presentations summarizing all we have learnt after 3 days.

Why Flutter? Why Study Jam?.
of-course, Why not flutter?. One app on two major platforms i.e Android and IOS.
Why study Jam, We want to be able to have more time with you the developers so that we teach you and at the same time see you put the knowledge to practice.

Who qualifies to Attend
All web and software developers interested in learning the modern way of developing apps using flutter.
Anyone with an app and is willing to learn a better way to make the app cross platform compatibility.
Anyone enthusiastic about new technology wants to learn flutter.
Computer Science, IT and Computer Engineering Students working on their 2nd year and final year final year projects and want better technologies to help them grasp simple flutter principles to reduce their workload in creating apps that they will deploy on the market immediately after their presentations.

Extra Bonuses.
Whoever will complete the course will earn a badge and also a certificate of participation something that you can always carry along in your career.
events.how_to_find_us: Come to Star Shopping Arcade Just Behind Oxford Inn

events.name: Cloud Study Jams with Machine Learning APIs
events.description: With the increase of machine learning applicability in the world today, we shall go through a host of APIs and finally get our hands dirty with one of the APIs of our choice

events.name: [Extras]TensorFlow Dev Summit Viewing Party!
events.description:
You are a machine learning enthusiast and yes we know that and that's why we bring you this special moment for you to join fellow enthusiasts to share and hear how other developers in the world are using tensor-flow to develop amazing solutions. The live streams will be followed by few directed discussions and we shall go home amplified.
Don't dare miss, We invite both beginners and intermediate machine learning developers.
events.how_to_find_us: Come to City Mall, Second Floor, Room 34

group_profile.title: Eng
group_profile.intro: Arinda is a computer engineer professional and sales executive by passion, He has co-founded two firms named Codinex Uganda and Bratha Uganda which are a Software Development Firm and e-Commerce Platform respectively. He is Passionate about Tech.
